content.question: Intelligence tests have been used throughout history to purposefully discriminate against groups of people. Claims that minority groups have lower IQ scores because of genetic factors fail to consider which of the following?

choices.label: IQ tests are not valid measures of intelligence.
IQ test scores are dependent on social factors such as educational opportunity and poverty.
IQ tests only measure verbal skills, which might impact some groups due to language barriers.
IQ tests are unreliable measures of intelligence.

content.answer: IQ test scores are dependent on social factors such as educational opportunity and poverty.

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
